__TOC__

* Contact: Paul Mellors [paul@paulmellors.net]
* Contact: Philip Wyett [philip.wyett@gmail.com] (no longer have this laptop)
* Contact: Marco Pallotta [marco.pallotta@gmail.com] (for Hardy)

* Make: Sony
* Brand: Vaio
* Model: VGN-FS415M
* Processor: Intel Pentium M Processor 740 (1.73GHz, 800MHz FSB, 2MiB L2 Cache)
* Memory: 512MiB DDR2 (default)
* HDD: 80GB PATA
* Graphics: nVidia GeForce Go 6400 with 32MiB DDR native memory (upto 128MiB shared using TurboCache technology)
* Sound: Realtek ALC260 2-Channel High Definition Audio Codec 3D Surround AC 97
* Wired Network: Intel FW82801FBM + 82562ET - 10Base-T/100Base-TX
* Wireless Network: Intel IPW 2200BG
* Website: http://www.vaio-link.com/specifications/specifications.asp?l=en&category=0&serie=VGN-FS&m=2155

=== System Info ===

* bios-version: R0090J1
* system-manufacturer: Sony Corporation
* system-product-name: VGN-FS415M
* system-version: C3LM1GJ8

=== Current Issues ===

When using the 686 kernel detailed below from dapper, the laptop will take a long time
to mount the root partition at boot, has slow 2D redraw on the desktop and CPU temperature
is on average 5 degrees celcius higher than with the 386 kernel.

Linux wyett 2.6.15-26-686 #1 SMP PREEMPT Thu Aug 3 03:13:28 UTC 2006 i686 GNU/Linux
